'''Inugami's End''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to destroy two Rifthound Skulls within a short time.

==Gameplay Notes==
*The skulls are created by [[Golden Wolflord]] when it creates a shield.
*The player can use {{Geo}} for easier breaking.
